tool_description: Monitors competitor pricing data to understand market positioning and competitive landscape for pricing decisions.

competitor_names.description: List of competitor names to track

monitoring_period_days.description: Number of days to look back for competitor data

price_threshold_percent.description: Minimum price difference threshold for alerts

include_out_of_stock.description: Whether to include out-of-stock items in analysis

error_messages: Invalid monitoring period: Period must be between 1 and 365 days.
Competitor not found: One or more competitor names are not recognized in the database.
Category not found: One or more product categories do not exist.
Invalid threshold: Price threshold must be between 0.1 and 100 percent.
No competitor data available: No pricing data found for specified competitors and categories.
usage: Specify product_categories and competitor_names arrays, set monitoring_period_days for lookback period. Adjust price_threshold_percent to filter significant price differences.

price_comparison_count.description: Total number of price comparisons made
